item.title: Teaching learning machines football pt.1
item.description: How I tried to satisfy my FPL obsession by trying to gain an unfair advantage through AI: Part 1 – The Setup Gameweek 16. I’m midway through a season-long Fantasy Premier League (FPL) ban, which, in theory, should have won me back a few hours per week to plan a wedding. A wedding that, despite my persistent disorganisation, I’m hopeful my partner will still allow me to attend. I get an idea.
